message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out.
Come on, Bob, 58-42 is more than fair considering the inflation!
This is my final offer, Alice. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution.  The clock is ticking for both of us.
You said the clock is ticking, but it's ticking much louder for you. Inflation is eating away your share!
